item.title: Mobile Friendly Websites
item.description: Why Should I Make My Website Mobile Friendly? Practically everyone is on a mobile phone now. As of 2016 there are 2.1 billion smartphone users. Even more impressive is more than 3 out of 4 people would choose to search the internet on their phone over a desktop computer even if they had easy access to a desktop computer. Why? It’s faster and easier. I have an old Moto X from 2013, the original one.
